input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Acrimet Wall-mounted Modular File Holder (2 - Pack) (Smoke Color)

Item keywords:
Modern Modular Design Easy to expand to fit your needs
Modern, strong and sturdy construction
Includes Wall Hangers
Makes Organizing Easy
Set with 2
input_text.Response A: A modern modular design, this 2-pack of wall-mounted file holders can be used to organize your workspace or home office. With a sturdy construction and easy-to-expand design, you can easily fit your needs. The smoke color gives the set a modern look that will complement any decor. This wall-mounted file holder is the perfect solution for anyone looking to organize their workspace or home office. Its modern design, strong and sturdy construction, and easy-to-expand features make it a must-have for anyone looking to stay organized.
input_text.Response B: The Acrimet Wall-Modular Filer Holder is easy to use and expand to fit your needs. Comes with wall hanger. Modern and sleek design in “smoke” color is perfect for files, folders, magazines, papers and more. This space saving organizational tool makes this item ideal for homes, offices, schools, hospitals and more.  Set of 2 included with your purchase.

label_annotations.feedback:
A repeats "sturdy construction"
B misses  sturdy construction altogether , but adds "Comes with wall hanger." as a complete sentence, which is at odds with ". .  generate exciting product description"
